page.title: 19UPSTREET GEN. DESCRIPTION
page.content: Where I live there is a farm and it is called Upstreet Farm. There are two big flats where we live and I don't want to move until I am older. We live near a park called Grove Ferry and we are in the country and new houses have been built here. We live near Grove Court and the Upstreet Farm has got some chickens and they make a lot of noise every day and you can hear them at our house. A mile away is our school which is not that big. At our school we have got a big playground. Near me there is an inn called the Ship Inn, two shops, a post office and a farm shop. Near us is my friends house.
